body.name: 9D Electric Head Shaver for Bald Men, Upgraded 6-in-1 Head Shaver for Bald Men, Waterproof Wet/Dry Grooming Kit Electric Shaver for Men, Cordless Rechargeable Bald Head Razor for Home&Travel Gift

features: ✅【Upgraded 9D Floating Head Shaver】The mens electric shavers is equipped with 9 sharp floating heads and double ring blades.Can perfectly follows the contours of your face,the head,the neck and jaw line.Electric shaver will not pull your hair and beard,reduce irritation to the skin and scalp,and improves the comfort and closeness of the shave.It ensure gentle and efficient shave to save your valuable time.

✅【6-in-1 Grooming Kit】Electric shavers for men includes 6 detachable Accessories, Head/Beard Shaver, Nose/Ear Hair Trimmer, Hair Trimmer(3/5/7mm), Facial Massage Brush, Facial Cleaning Brush, Body Trimmer. Professional 6 in 1 Multifunctional electric shavers, Different types of head razor shaver accessories meet all your personal facial shaving needs for beard and hair. Great gifts for husband, partner, father, friends and brothers

✅【IPX6 Waterproof Wet & Dry Razors】The shavers for men adopt IPX6 waterproof technology,the entire body is washable,satisfy both wet and dry use.It's fantastically easy to clean, just put the shaver head under the tap to wash.Bald head shaver perfect for use in the shower, you can use with gel or foam.

✅【Fast & Effective Precision Shaving Heads】 Bald head shaver for men uses double-layer durable blade to accurately capture long and short hairs, which are precise, sharp and safe. The double net provides protection and reduces irritation. The intelligent induction system effectively prevents hair pinching. We promise lifetime free warranty, feel free to contact us at any time if you have any questions with this electric razor.

✅【Anti-pinch System】This razor is designed with your face and neck curves in mind, Its double-layer durable blades and upgraded 7D floating shaving system help increase your shaving area while still giving you a comfortable experience, and its skin-friendly protection system protects your skin from irritation. On top of that, its intelligent sensing battery status ensures that even when the battery is low, it can maintain stable power operation and helps to prevent hair pinching.

✅【LED Intelligent Display】This electric bald shaver is designed to optimize your shaving experience. It features a LED intelligent display that accurately displays battery power and automatically records usage time. Its long press on/off button triggers a safety lock, avoiding accidental touching and extra power consumption. And with its USB charging cable, you can get a full 90 minutes of use after just 2 hours of charging. Get that close, comfortable, and safe shave now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Perfect Christmas Gift for Dad - A Five-Star Head Shaver!
reviews.reviewText: Introduction:I recently purchased the 9d Electric Head Shaver Head from Amazon as a Christmas gift for my dad, and I have to say, it exceeded my expectations in every way possible! This fantastic grooming tool has quickly become his favorite, providing smooth, hassle-free head shaves without compromising on comfort. Here's why I believe this head shaver deserves an outstanding five-star rating:1. Outstanding Performance:The 9d Electric Head Shaver Head delivers unmatched performance when it comes to head shaving. Its powerful motor ensures a quick and effortless experience, effortlessly gliding through even the thickest hair. The hypoallergenic blades guarantee a close and precise shave, leaving a smooth and professional finish every time. Dad absolutely loves the flawless results and is amazed by the speed and efficiency of this marvelous device.2. Versatility at Its Best:This head shaver isn't only limited to head shaving; it's a versatile tool that can be used for facial hair grooming, beard trimming, or even body shaving. With the included attachments and adjustable settings, dad can achieve his desired style effortlessly, regardless of the hair length or texture. This versatile capability, combined with its exceptional shaving performance, sets this head shaver apart from the rest.3. Long Battery Life and Easy Maintenance:We all know how frustrating it can be when a grooming device runs out of battery mid-shave. But fear not, as the 9d Electric Head Shaver Head boasts an impressive battery life that allows dad to shave multiple times without worrying about recharging. The quick charging feature is an added perk that ensures minimal downtime. Furthermore, the device is incredibly easy to clean and maintain, thanks to its detachable parts and washable design.4. Excellent Value for Money:When I compared the price-performance ratio of this head shaver with alternative options, I found it to be exceptional value for money. Considering its top-notch quality, impressive performance, versatility, and long-lasting battery, this device truly delivers on all fronts. It offers professional-level results without breaking the bank, making it an excellent investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very superior to other brands, ExcelentRazor
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this head razor, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. This razor has exceeded my expectations in every way possible.First and foremost, the digital display on this razor is a game-changer. It provides real-time information about battery life, shaving time, and even prompts for cleaning. This feature adds a level of convenience that I haven't experienced with other razors.The razor quality itself is top-notch. It effortlessly glides over my head, providing a smooth and close shave every time. I appreciate the precision and efficiency of the blades, making the shaving process quick and comfortable.One of the standout features of this razor is the variety of tools it comes with. From different blade attachments to grooming accessories, this razor offers versatility that caters to all my grooming needs. It's like having a complete grooming kit in one device.Overall, I am extremely satisfied with this head shaver razor. The combination of the digital display, exceptional razor quality, and multiple tools make it a must-have for anyone looking for a reliable and versatile grooming solution. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality Head Shaver
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the Electric Head Shaver for Bald Men, and I am beyond impressed with its performance. This upgraded 6-in-1 grooming kit has truly redefined my bald head shaving experience, making it a standout product in the market.The waterproof design of this shaver caught my attention, and it has lived up to its promise. The ability to use it for both wet and dry shaving has added a level of convenience to my grooming routine. Whether I prefer a quick dry shave or a more indulgent wet shave with gel, this shaver adapts seamlessly, providing a consistently smooth result.The 6-in-1 grooming kit is a game-changer. It includes various attachments for head shaving, beard trimming, and even precision grooming. The versatility of this kit ensures that it caters to all my grooming needs in one compact and efficient device. It's a true all-in-one solution that simplifies my routine.The cordless and rechargeable design enhances the shaver's practicality. I appreciate the freedom it provides during use, without being constrained by cords. The quick recharge feature ensures that it's always ready for action, making it an ideal choice for both home and travel use. The portability factor is especially valuable to me, as it allows me to maintain my preferred grooming style wherever I go.The thoughtful design elements, such as the ergonomic grip and intuitive controls, contribute to a comfortable and user-friendly experience. The shaver effortlessly navigates the curves of my head, providing a close and precise shave without any discomfort.In summary, the Electric Head Shaver for Bald Men has exceeded my expectations. Its waterproof functionality, versatile grooming kit, cordless design, and thoughtful ergonomics make it a top-tier choice for anyone seeking a reliable and efficient bald head shaving solution. I highly recommend this shaver to fellow bald men looking for a quality grooming tool that delivers outstanding results. It's not just a shaver; it's a grooming kit that simplifies and elevates the bald head shaving experience.
I was very surprised at how well this works. Much better than a Remington one I own which is twice the price.
